getOrbsAddress(address).details: returns the orbs node public address of a specific validator.

getRegistrationBlockNumber(address).details: returns in which block the validator was registered and last updated.

isValidator(address).details: returns if the address belongs to a validator

leave().details: delete the validator metadata. only msg.sender can leave.

params.ipAddress: bytes4 The validator node ip address
params.name: string The name of the validator
params.orbsAddress: bytes20 The validator node orbs public address
params.website: string The website of the validator

reviewRegistration().details: Convenience method to check if you are a validator and what are your details.

update(string,bytes4,string,bytes20).details: update validator metadata. only msg.sender can update the validator details.

params.ipAddress: bytes4 The validator node ip address
params.name: string The name of the validator
params.orbsAddress: bytes20 The validator node orbs public address
params.website: string The website of the validator
